argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | bitsinv.k | |- K = `' ( bits |` NN0 ) |
| 2 |  | #P_sumeq1 | |- ( x = A -> sum_ k e. x ( 2 ^ k ) = sum_ k e. A ( 2 ^ k ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_bitsf1ocnv | |- ( ( bits |` NN0 ) : NN0 -1-1-onto-> ( ~P NN0 i^i Fin ) /\ `' ( bits |` NN0 ) = ( x e. ( ~P NN0 i^i Fin ) |-> sum_ k e. x ( 2 ^ k ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simpri | |- `' ( bits |` NN0 ) = ( x e. ( ~P NN0 i^i Fin ) |-> sum_ k e. x ( 2 ^ k ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_eqtri | |- K = ( x e. ( ~P NN0 i^i Fin ) |-> sum_ k e. x ( 2 ^ k ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_sumex | |- sum_ k e. A ( 2 ^ k ) e. _V |
| 7 | 2, 5, 6 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( A e. ( ~P NN0 i^i Fin ) -> ( K ` A ) = sum_ k e. A ( 2 ^ k ) ) |
